metadata.title: CVE-2014-9673 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer signedness error in the Mac_Read_POST_Resource function inbase/ftobjs.c in FreeType before 2.5.4 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a crafted Mac font.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4').
